title: Hard Days
writer: Michihito Fujii, Kenya Hirata, Kim Seong-hun
short_cast: Junichi Okada, Go Ayano, Ryoko Hirosue, Hayato Isomura, Tetta Sugimoto, Akira Emoto, Taro Suruga, Takashi Yamanaka, Mario Kuroba, Ryusuke Komakine, Maho Yamada, Kurumi Shimizu
cast: Junichi Okada, Go Ayano, Ryoko Hirosue, Hayato Isomura, Tetta Sugimoto, Akira Emoto, Taro Suruga, Takashi Yamanaka, Mario Kuroba, Ryusuke Komakine, Maho Yamada, Kurumi Shimizu
genre: Japanese, Crime Movies, Action & Adventure Movies

desc: Already running from a mess of problems, a desperate cop thinks he's gotten away with a hit-and-run. But there was a witness, and they've got his number.
